data.message: Just because I have homosexual friends doesn't mean I agree with their lifestyle.

replies.message: Right and you don't have to but please let us all live in peace.

Can I share Stephen's comment?

Chase, I love my dog, can I marry my dog?
There's a difference between logical and illogical.
Brad, I guess it depends on what your dog says. What?! You mean it can't speak?! Then I guess it's nothing close to gay marriage, because it can't express consent. Nice try. You failed.
I don't think they are your friends if you secretly think less of them.
comment

Just because you don't agree with their lifestyle doesn't mean you can deny them the same rights others enjoy.

Psst, hey Brad. You can marry your dog when it can give consent. I.e., sign a contract.
Personally, I believe Brad's dog is going to be the only shot he has at marriage.

I'm pretty sure the point Brad was trying to make is that now marriage has no definition. We've lost it. Marriage means nothing now. So who really cares what's next-- if a guy wants to marry his dog and a lady wants to marry her cat, who's to stop them? Marriage is no longer the beautiful, sacred thing it once was.

wtf, Abbie? And it's not like you're wrong: people getting married for legal benefits, people having a gunshot wedding (oops! sex before marriage), and divorce rates around half of all marriages. Yep. Very "sacred" and "spiritual." lmao, try again!

Also, homosexuality is not a lifestyle. Just...what the hell? I'm laughing!

Wait, you're a psychology major?! And you think that homosexuality is a lifestyle?! Either change your major because you should not be any sort of psychologist when you think like this, or uni is teaching you crap. From another psych major student, have a good day.
What's your major?!!!!!Lol!!!
Then quit the friendship, as popularly known, birds of same feather flock together, right?
Troy, you are a moron.
Thank YOU.  I have friend that STEAL and I don't agree with what they do also!!!
hi Terasayah, hope your not accepting swollen goods from your crooked `friends`!
All gays R a bunch of freaks

Homosexuality is not a "Lifestyle" choice like smoking or choosing to live at the beach....it is like being born with blue eyes or being born a particular race.  Homosexuals are born that way and should be respected.  Further, denying homosexuals the basic human dignities of marriage and right to raise and adopt children is so fundamentally unfair and unconstitutional.

Same-sex attraction may not be a choice, but "gay" certainly is.  "Gay" implies participation in that lifestyle; it's NOT merely a synonym for "homosexual."  But BEING homosexual is no more a person's fault than being heterosexual is.  (Disordered sexual BEHAVIOR, however, whether homosexual or heterosexual in nature, is destructive to all persons involved.  It masquerades as love, but it is really just lust.)
Omission   doesn’t mean showing smartness rather implies the psychological disorder—more or less—Hah! Hah!
well why have gay friends then if you don't agree with their lifestyle
Fidel, who do think you are? They're normal people like us. Just because they like the same sex does NOT make them freaks!
Respect, is a lifestyle
